divs: sighting detailswas outside and noticed what looked like two lights side by side and 2 lights directly below the first too offset slightly. you could make out what looked like a disc in the center at an angle. was pretty big. i'd say it was approximately 1\4 mile up in the sky and about 2 or 3 miles away from our location. it traveled relatively slow and maintained altitude as it slowly traveled due north. was witnessed by 5 people.
